root.name: Palamedes
root.description: GeneralPalamedes is a puzzle game that was released in 1990 for the NES and GameboyGameplay gameplay involves a six sided die, gameplay is a mix of magical drop and bust a move. Your character can cycle between die sides 1-6 by using the B button and then throw them with the A button. Matching sides will vanish, as you break down blocks you will fill the bar below your character different combinations of dice will remove lines from the screen. There are 3 modes single player , 2 player and tournament.
